name: numItineraries
info: The maximum number of possible itineraries to return.

name: bannedStops
info: A comma-separated list of banned stops.

name: walkReluctance
info: A multiplier for how bad walking is, compared to being in transit for equal lengths of time.

name: walkBoardCost
info: Prevents unnecessary transfers by adding a cost for boarding a vehicle. This is the cost that is used when boarding while walking.

name: bikeSwitchTime
info: The time it takes the user to fetch their bike and park it again in seconds.

name: bikeSwitchCost
info: The cost it takes the user to fetch their bike and park it again in seconds.

name: waitReluctance
info: How much worse is waiting for a transit vehicle than being on a transit vehicle, as a multiplier.

name: waitAtBeginningFactor
info: How much less bad is waiting at the beginning of the trip.

name: bikeBoardCost
info: Prevents unnecessary transfers by adding a cost for boarding a vehicle. This is the cost that is used when boarding while biking.

name: ignoreRealtimeUpdates
info: Ignore real time updates of the network.

name: maxHours
info: The maximum number of hours the route is allowed to take.

name: transferPenalty
info: An additional penalty added to boardings after the first.
